评论概述: Not Bad. Read My Review About Sizing and Color
评论详情: This top has a decent fit. The fabric is fairly stretchy so it slings to your body enough to provide a clean look if you tuck it into your jeans. I think it runs on the small side. I bought a medium and if it were a numbered sizing system it would be between a 4 and a 6. If you wear a size 8 or 10 and/or have a large bust line, the medium probably wouldn't work for you. Since it is stretchy, you have some "wiggle room" on sizing. I wash it in the washing machine with tap-cold water and toss it on medium heat for just a couple of minutes to take out some wrinkles then hang to dry in the laundry room. The color is not quite as peachy as it looked here online.

评论概述: Long Sleeve - Crewneck - Rib Knit - Slim Fit Shirt
评论详情: I ordered my normal XX-Large and it fits beautifully.  It is slim fitting; however, not as slim fitting as some I have ordered in the past.  This has a little more room and it's much more comfortable.  The sleeves and top have plenty of length.  I ordered the Coral - it's beautiful - one of my very favorite tops.  I also ordered the Light Purple, which is also very pretty.  The colors are almost exactly as shown in the description.  It's made of 93% Rayon and 7% Elastance.  It recommends washing it in cold water on the gentle cycle.  I washed it inside out in cold water on the delicate cycle.  I hung it to dry.  Once it was dry, I put it in the dryer with a dryer sheet for a few minutes to prevent static.  It turned out perfect!  There are so many pretty colors to choose from - I definitely plan to order more.
Love the fit of this top, it fits true to size! It’s so comfortable and stretchy! This is the perfect top to wear alone or layered! Definitely snagging more colors!!
